text: The Komi Autonomous Soviet Socialist Republic (; ), abbreviated as Komi ASSR (; ), was an autonomous republic of the RSFSR within the Soviet Union, established in 1936 as successor of Komi-Zyryan Autonomous Oblast. In 1991, it became the Komi Republic, a federal subject of Russia. ==See also== *First Secretary of the Komi Communist Party Category:States and territories established in 1936 Category:Autonomous republics of the Soviet Union Category:1936 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: Komi Autonomous Soviet Socialist Republic
